price: (Abo) ni ibivume. Aho bazasangwa hose bazafatwe maze bicwe (nta mpuhwe).
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
